text: Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for gaming is incredible, especially the Intel Core i7. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The build material is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the Refurbished: HP Omen 17-an012dx 17.3" FHD Gaming Laptop i7-7700HQ 12GB 1TB RX 580 W10!

Quite disappointed with this laptop, the Refurbished: HP Omen 17-an012dx 17.3" FHD Gaming Laptop i7-7700HQ 12GB 1TB RX 580 W10. It blue screens occasionally frequently when playing Apex Legends, and the performance throttles significantly. The fan noise has been a letdown. Wouldn't recommend.

The Refurbished: HP Omen 17-an012dx 17.3" FHD Gaming Laptop i7-7700HQ 12GB 1TB RX 580 W10 does what it says on the tin. Good for gaming, but the fan noise could be better. Had a minor issue with bloatware, but it was resolved. Solid, but not spectacular.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Starfield and Apex Legends. The build quality of the Refurbished: HP Omen 17-an012dx 17.3" FHD Gaming Laptop i7-7700HQ 12GB 1TB RX 580 W10 is solid, and the keyboard is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

The Refurbished: HP Omen 17-an012dx 17.3" FHD Gaming Laptop i7-7700HQ 12GB 1TB RX 580 W10 does what it says on the tin. Good for gaming, but the fan noise could be better. Had a minor issue with bloatware, but it was resolved. Solid, but not spectacular.
